questions.quote: I once told a woman that I don't eat cake 'cause it goes right to my thighs.
It was because you hated your father and you would do anything to displease him. Isn't THAT true?
That's their secret sign! See, Van Buren, he was teh eighth President..  They thought I was a former Van B. Boy!
Okay, let's see. The beachhouse. 48 acres... ooh. Southampton. That should fetch a fair price.
Oh, because I called over there a couple of times and the manager didn't like it.
I see, well, that's open to interpretation. Because so much depends on the layering and the quality of the wetness in the eyes.
Get in a little closer. I can't see the screen door.  Perfect.
You hear about that kid that was kidnapped the other day in Pennsylvania?
Oh. No. I can't do this any more. I can't. It's too long.  Quit telling your stupid story, about the stupid desert, and just die already!  Die!!
And yet, it's perfectly legal to take a man's soul and crush it out like a stale Pall Mall.
